Entries.Alissa0: Wait, @? What are you doing?$l#$b#Oh, don't tell me! No way!$l#$b#It's a YES of course, @! I love you!
Entries.Alissa1: I can't wait to tell Olga and Bert!! I'm so happy @!$h
Entries.Corine0: Hey, uhm... @? Is that what I think it is?$l#$b#Oh my Yoba, @...$l#$b#Of course! Of course it's a yes! I really love you.$l
Entries.Corine1: I'll tell dad later. He will be so surprised!$h
Entries.Flor0: Oh wow, that necklace looks interesting, @...#$b#Wait...$u#$b#Are you?$l#$b#@! I... I don't know what to say...$l#$b#Yes! Yes, I will marry you!$l
Entries.Flor1: I'm so excited, @... I love you!$l
Entries.Ian0: Oh hey. Are you joking? Don't tell me you're joking!$l#$b#@! No way! Really?$h#$b#Of course I'll marry you! I love you.$l
Entries.Ian1: Wow. I can't believe we're getting married!$h
Entries.Jeric0: @!$u#$b#I... I don't know what to say!$l#$b#I'm speechless!$l#$b#Come here, you!#$b#Of course. It's a YES!$h
Entries.Jeric1: This is amazing! I can't wait to start a life with you!$h
Entries.Kenneth0: @? Are you? Is that?$l#$b#This is surprising. I... I'm so happy, @.$l#$b#Yes. Yes of course I'll marry you, @. I love you.$l
Entries.Kenneth1: You made me the happiest man in the world right now! I'm so excited!$h
Entries.Maddie0: @! Now's not the time to play pranks on me!$a#$b#Wait... Are you serious?$l#$b#@! Is this real?$l#$b#@... I... I...#$b#Yes! Yes, I'll marry you! I really will!$l
Entries.Maddie1: Sorry, I was so surprised!$l#$b#I'm so happy, @... So very happy!$l
Entries.Philip0: Hey, uhm, are you...?$u#$b#@? Are you really serious?$l#$b#Yes! A hundred percent yes!$h#$b#I love you, @!$l
Entries.Philip1: I can't wait for our wedding, @!$h#$b#Oh wow! I'm so happy!$l
Entries.Shiro0: What!?$u#$b#@!?$l#$b#Do you really want... me?$l#$b#Have you thought about this?$l#$b#Isn't my answer obvious? Of course I want to marry you, @!$l#$b#I love you so much, @!$l
Entries.Shiro1: I'm so happy!$l#$b#I'm genuinely so happy right now, @. I can't wait to tell Yuuma.$h
Entries.Ysabelle0: @? Wait... Are you really proposing to me?$l#$b#@, @, @!$l#$b#I do! I do! I really do!$l#$b#I love you!$l
Entries.Ysabelle1: I have to tell grandpa! I'm so happy!$l#$b#@, I love you so much!$l

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Alissa in the bonds of marriage.

Entries.give_flowersA: Hey, what's this, @?#$b#Wait, Are you serious?$u#$b#You want me as your girlfriend?$l#$b#Of course it's a yes!$l#$b#I wouldn't have it any other way!$l#$e#I'm seriously so happy right now, I can't stop smiling!$l#$b#I love you!$l
Entries.give_flowersB: Hey, what's this, @?#$b#Wait, Are you serious?$u#$b#You want me as your girlfriend?$l#$b#Of course it's a yes!$l#$b#I wouldn't have it any other way!$l#$e#I'm seriously so happy right now, I can't stop smiling!$l#$b#I love you!$l
Entries.stardrop_gift: May our love be an everlasting duet, @.$l#$b#No song could ever summarize how much I appreciate and love you, @. I hope this little gift will show you how special you are to me.$l
Entries.rejectNPCA: I'm sorry but I don't... like you like that, @.$s#$b#I think you've got the wrong idea. I'm sorry but it's a no.$s
Entries.rejectNPCB: I'm sorry but I don't... like you like that, @.$s#$b#I think you've got the wrong idea. I'm sorry but it's a no.$s

Entries.give_flowersA: Oh wow!$u#$b#Are you sure about this?$l#$b#You really want me as your girlfriend?$l#$b#Of course I'd love to be your girlfriend!#$e#We're really together now!?$h#$b#I'm happy, so happy!$l#$e#I love you, @!$h
Entries.give_flowersB: Oh wow!$u#$b#Are you sure about this?$l#$b#You really want me as your girlfriend?$l#$b#Of course I'd love to be your girlfriend!#$e#We're really together now!?$h#$b#I'm happy, so happy!$l#$e#I love you, @!$h
Entries.stardrop_gift: We've been through a lot and you were with me all the way.$l#$b#I just wanted to give you something that might show you how much you mean to me.$h#$b#Something that might show you how much I love you.$l#$b#I will love and protect you forever.$h
Entries.rejectNPCA: Oh, uhm... $u#$b#I don't want you to take this the wrong way... but I don't like you like that.$s#$b#I mean we could just be friends, right?#$b#I'm really sorry, @.$s
Entries.rejectNPCB: Oh, uhm... $u#$b#I don't want you to take this the wrong way... but I don't like you like that.$s#$b#I mean we could just be friends, right?#$b#I'm really sorry, @.$s

Entries.give_flowersA: Ah, that's a beautiful arrangement of flowers.$h#$b#Wait, uhm... Isn't this?$u#$b#Of course! I'd love to be your girlfriend!$l#$b#Uhm... So what does a girlfriend do? I mean...$l#$b#I mean at what point does the relationship transcend from its current state...$l#$b#Oh, sorry. I got lost in thought there. I love you, @!$l
Entries.give_flowersB: Ah, that's a beautiful arrangement of flowers.$h#$b#Wait, uhm... Isn't this?$u#$b#Of course! I'd love to be your girlfriend!$l#$b#Uhm... So what does a girlfriend do? I mean...$l#$b#I mean at what point does the relationship transcend from its current state...$l#$b#Oh, sorry. I got lost in thought there. I love you, @!$l
Entries.stardrop_gift: I think I have finally found the special affinity, understanding and powerful bond that exists between one person and another, @...#$b#I think I have finally found my soulmate.$h#$b#Here's a little gift from me... to you. I hope you like it.$h#$b#I love you!$l
Entries.rejectNPCA: Uhm... No, I'm sorry. I don't have any interest in being in a romantic relationship. I'm too busy.#$b#I hope you understand.$h
Entries.rejectNPCB: Uhm... No, I'm sorry. I don't have any interest in being in a romantic relationship. I'm too busy.#$b#I hope you understand.$h

Entries.give_flowersA: @!? Hey? Do you know what this means?$l#$b#Wait, you're not joking, right?$h#$b#You're not!?$u#$b#Oh, @!$l#$b#Of course it's a yes! I love you, @!$h
Entries.give_flowersB: @!? Hey? Do you know what this means?$l#$b#Wait, you're not joking, right?$h#$b#You're not!?$u#$b#Oh, @!$l#$b#Of course it's a yes! I love you, @!$h
Entries.stardrop_gift: My life has been great with you in it and... Uh... You know I'm not that good with words, @.$l#$b#So here, I hope this shows you how much I really love you, @.$l
Entries.rejectNPCA: Oh? I, uh, don't think I like you like that.#$b#I'm sorry, it's a no.$s
Entries.rejectNPCB: Oh? I, uh, don't think I like you like that.#$b#I'm sorry, it's a no.$s

Entries.give_flowersA: Whoa!$u#$b#I... I'm speechless!$l#$b#I was just about to give you one too!$h#$b#Obviously the answer is yes!$l#$e#I have a handsome boyfriend now!$l^I have a beautiful girlfriend now!$l
Entries.give_flowersB: Whoa!$u#$b#I... I'm speechless!$l#$b#I was just about to give you one too!$h#$b#Obviously the answer is yes!$l#$e#I have a handsome boyfriend now!$l^I have a beautiful girlfriend now!$l
Entries.stardrop_gift: Hey @... You win. You have the most amazing farm.$l#$b#Ha ha! I'm being serious!$h#$b#It's because it's our family farm, it has us in it.$l#$b#Sorry, I can't really explain how much I love you using all these words...$l#$b#So I guess this gift will do!$h
Entries.rejectNPCA: I, uh... I'm sorry but it's a no.$s#$b#But hey, I'm flattered, though! Don't be a stranger.
Entries.rejectNPCB: I, uh... I'm sorry but it's a no.$s#$b#But hey, I'm flattered, though! Don't be a stranger.

Entries.give_flowersA: Nice set of flower there @.$h#$b#Wait, isn't that.#$b#Whaatt?!$u#$b#@? Really?$l#$b#You really shocked me there! It's yes ofcourse.$l#$b#I love you!$h *kisses you*#$e#I'm happy that you felt the same @.$l

Entries.stardrop_gift: Hey this might come off as cheesy but..$h#$b#You're the light of my life @. And you are amazing.$l#$b#I wanted to give you this as a symbol of my love. I hope you like it @. I love you.$h
Entries.rejectNPCA: Nope, Sorry I don't have time for those things @.#$b#I think I'm not cut for that.$s
Entries.rejectNPCB: Nope, Sorry I don't have time for those things @.#$b#I think I'm not cut for that.$s

Entries.stardrop_gift: Hey, I'll only be this cheesy once so you better listen carefully.$l#$b#Take this gift, because you deserve it.$l#$b#You managed to make me love again. But more importantly...#$b#You made me love myself again.$l#$b#I love you so much, @.$h

Entries.give_flowersA: Whoa, really!?$l#$b#Ha ha! You're just messing with me?$l#$b#You're not!?$l#$b#Oh my Yoba, isn't the answer obvious? It's a yes!$l#$e#I feel like I'm flying right now! I'm so happy!$h

Entries.stardrop_gift: You know, I read about all those superheroes in the comics...$l#$b#But the only actual superhero in real life is you.$l#$b#So, here's a gift for the one and only Super-@. I hope you like it.$h#$b#You mean so much to me, I love you!$h

Entries.rejectNPCB: I don't think I like you like that, @.$s#$b#I hope I didn't give you the wrong idea or something. Again, I'm really sorry.$s

Entries.give_flowersA: @? What... Are you serious?$u#$b#Yeah, absolutely!$h#$b#I'll be honest, I was trying to get up the nerve to buy a bouquet for you.$l#$b#But I wasn't sure if you were just being really nice to me, or actually felt the same way...$l#$b#Oh man, my heart is pounding.$h

Entries.stardrop_gift: Hey, I have someting for you.$h#$b#I just want you to know how glad I am that you're mine. It makes everything worth it, really.$l#$b#I really love, you, @.$l
Entries.rejectNPCA: Uh, no. Sorry.#$b#I mean, I really don't have the time, with everything going on, and I have to focus on Yuuma.#$b# So, yeah. Sorry.
Entries.rejectNPCB: Uh, no. Sorry.#$b#I mean, I really don't have the time, with everything going on, and I have to focus on Yuuma.#$b# So, yeah. Sorry.

Entries.give_flowersA: Oh, oh my.$l#$b#You want me to be your girlfriend?$l#$b#I would love that. I would love to be your girlfriend!$h#$b#I thought you'd never ask!$h#$b#I can't believe this. I'm so happy.$h#$b#I should go tell Corine and Abigail!$h
Entries.give_flowersB: Oh, oh my.$l#$b#You want me to be your girlfriend?$l#$b#I would love that. I would love to be your girlfriend!$h#$b#I thought you'd never ask!$h#$b#I can't believe this. I'm so happy.$h#$b#I should go tell Corine and Abigail!$h
Entries.stardrop_gift: Darling, you're the most amazing person in the whole wide world. You're simply the best.$l#$b#You don't know how happy I am to be living a life with you in it.$l#$b#Here's a gift for you, baby. I hope it properly expresses the love I feel for you.$h#$b#I love you so much, @.$l
Entries.rejectNPCA: Oh dear...$u#$b#I'm sorry but I have to reject your offer.$s#$b#I don't think we're meant for each other.@$s#$e#I hope you understand.$s#$b#I apologize if I have given you the wrong impression.$7

Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Alissa: This is a great idea for a date, darling! I'm so excited!$h#$b#I'll meet you there, okay? I have to go clean up first!
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Corine: Yay, date night! I love your idea, @!$h#$b#Just a moment, I'll be ready in a jiffy.$h#$e#I'm excited to spend some time with you!$l
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Flor: Oh, but of course! I'd love to go to the movies with you, @!$h#$b#Would you like me to bring some snacks, or should we buy some there?
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Ian: Movie night? That's a great idea, honey.$l#$b#I'm just gonna grab something, then we'll be on our way!$h
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Jeric: Date night? Fantastic!$h#$b#I was considering getting the tickets myself, can't wait to spend more time with you, babe!$l
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Kenenth: Movie night? Now you're talking!$h#$b#I'd love to join you! Let's go!
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Maddie: Aww, a movie date? I'd love to go to the movies with you!$9#$b#But PLEASE don't eat my snacks this time, okay?$6
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Philip: A movie? Great idea, honey!$h#$b#We should make a date night out of this!$l#$e#A dinner under the stars after the movie, maybe?$6
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Shiro: Ah! A much needed break!$h#$b#I love you and your creative date ideas, @.$l
Entries.MovieInvite_Spouse_Ysabelle: A movie date, mon amour? I'd love to go to the movies with you!$l#$b#I love movies and I love you, ha ha!$h
